content:
Thank you for clarifying that. It sounds like you've got a compact and sleek wireless charging pad that fits nicely on your nightstand, which is great for saving space.

I completely agree with you on the convenience aspect of wireless charging. Sometimes, it's not just about the charging speed, but about the ease of use and the lack of hassle. Wireless charging can be a great way to simplify your daily routine, especially when it comes to overnight charging.

It's also good to know that you haven't noticed a huge difference in charging speeds, which means the wireless charging pad is doing its job well enough for your needs. If you're not using fast charging, then the wireless charging speed might not be a major concern for you.

Overall, it sounds like you're enjoying the benefits of wireless charging, and that's what matters most!
